title: Dark Star Icon
body: I remember very early on in this Dark Star event my two friends invited me to join them, where we lost a few and won many in Dark Star Singularity. If I am correct, all I needed was one win with these two friends to unlock the other icon. Is there any reason I wouldn't have it by now? (I don't remember when the deadline was for those to be shipped out.)

replies.body: I went through all of your Dark Star matches (whew it was a lot to comb over!) and do see that you had quite a few premade games.  I went ahead and added the corruption icon to your account.  Grats!
Yeah the same thing happened to me i didnt get the second icon for winning with 2 teamates in the Dark Star singularity game can you please check since i really love collecting limited icons
